CustomField.description:
This field tracks business days
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( Today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( Status_Changed_DateTime__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(DATEVALUE( Status_Changed_DateTime__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: No. of business days took for inital update
CustomField.label: Days to 1st Update
